text: Nde thukhɨngira ndɨkndɨgɨri. Mba Fhe Bakɨme nde nɨɨŋgi ndavar simtɨk, ana nde nzuav mbarkɨrga tɨvir vhuuiŋ ndiv hiaŋ tɨgi. Fhe Bakɨme mba tɨva muuŋgiap, nden kurigim, nde vhemkora wari wo buni ndiav thɨgar maangeŋ vuzvugi. Ana nde ndɨkndɨgi khavim, nde tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui guma, nde ana vhegap, nde vhɨra Fhe Bakɨmen rivgi. Ana nde muuŋgim, nde guigira vhemkora na ganɨv, nan kurkurargeŋ vuzvugi. Nde mba tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui guma, nde khaŋ tɨgap havhargiap anan tɨvi ndiv thɨgar mbarigi. Ana nde mbuim, nde tɨvir vhuuiŋra mbui. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde bigɨn thueŋ nzuav simtɨk ki fhu.
